item.description:
Sarah brought the following event to my attention and I think it would be a great opportunity to listen to a current successful writer talk about his work and the craft of writing.

Where: Porter Square Books.

When: Thursday, June 4th.

What: David Sedaris will be here to read from the paperback of When You Are Engulfed in
Flames. A limited number of tickets
for this event will go on sale Monday, May 4 for $16.80, the
price of the book.

I think the best way is for people to try and get themselves a ticket and then we can all meet up together.

- Alexa
